channel.title: web-dev on Kamnik Boštjan
channel.description: Recent content in web-dev on Kamnik Boštjan

item.title: Eco Camp
item.description: The client wanted to display basic info regarding his eco camp on the website. Furthermore, he wanted the ability to manage content under the ‘art-zone’ section. I’ve used NetlifyCMS to add content management support.

item.title: Habitat Wix Website
item.description: A website built in Wix for the Dog Hotel Habitat located in Billje, Croatia available under https://www.habitat.com.hr/ or https://renatazilic.wixsite.com/website/ The website has been built during my stay volunteer stay in the dog hotel. I’ve been there for a month. Walking, feeding dogs and cleaning the place clean. It has been very giving experience, during which I also got to design and create this awesome website for them. It is made in Wix and the logos, images and text have been supplied by the owner the dog hotel.
